title: California launches site to track results of rape kits after police backlogs
dc:creator: Mackenzie Mays
description: Atty. Gen. Rob Bonta launches website to track rape test kit results after years of backlogs at police departments.
content:encoded: Atty. Gen. Rob Bonta launches website to track rape test kit results after years of backlogs at police departments.

media:content.media:description: FILE - This Feb. 8, 2017, file photo, sexual assault evidence collection kits are shown during committee meeting at the Utah State Capitol, in Salt Lake City. The backlog of untested rape kits is growing even after state lawmakers passed a law in 2017 to address the issue, in part because the legislature didn't provide enough money to hire the necessary technicians for the state crime lab, KUTV reports. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer, File )
